metadata.Title: CVE-2015-9290 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In FreeType before 2.6.1, a buffer over-read occurs in type1/t1parse.c on function T1_Get_Private_Dict where there is no check that the new values of cur and limit are sensible before going to Again.

criterions.comment: freetype: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
